product_name: Smith I/OS Snow Goggles - Asian Fit - Women's
long_description: With rimless interchangeability for smaller faces, the Asian-fit women's Smith I/OS Snow Goggles sport fluid lines, a revolutionary outrigger locking mechanism and topnotch antifog performance.
short_description: With rimless interchangeability for smaller faces, the Asian-fit women's Smith I/OS Snow Goggles sport fluid lines, a revolutionary outrigger locking mechanism and topnotch antifog performance.
